tool_description: The Image Type Converter API is a powerful tool that allows users to convert images from one format to another seamlessly. With this API, developers can integrate image type conversion functionality into their applications, websites, or services, enabling users to convert images on the fly without the need for additional software or tools.
name: Image Type Converter API
title: Image Type Converter API

api_list.name: converter
api_list.description: Converts an image from one format to another.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-type-converter-api.p.rapidapi.com/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-type-converter-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
